URL: https://github.com/acmesh-official/acme.sh

ns0:entry.ns0:title: anthropics/claude-code
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/anthropics/claude-code
Language: shell
Claude Code is an agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster by executing routine tasks, explaining complex code, and handling git workflows - all through natural language commands.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: automazeio/ccpm
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/automazeio/ccpm
Language: shell
Project management system for Claude Code using GitHub Issues and Git worktrees for parallel agent execution.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: ohmybash/oh-my-bash
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/ohmybash/oh-my-bash

ns0:entry.ns0:title: ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh
Language: shell
ğŸ™ƒ A delightful community-driven (with 2,400+ contributors) framework for managing your zsh configuration. Includes 300+ optional plugins (rails, git, macOS, hub, docker, homebrew, node, php, python, etc), 140+ themes to spice up your morning, and an auto-update tool that makes it easy to keep up with the latest updates from the community.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: ophub/amlogic-s9xxx-armbian
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/ophub/amlogic-s9xxx-armbian
Language: shell
Support for Armbian in Amlogic, Rockchip and Allwinner boxes. Support a311d, s922x, s905x3, s905x2, s912, s905d, s905x, s905w, s905, s905l, rk3588, rk3568, rk3399, rk3328, h6, etc.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: piyushsachdeva/AzureDevOps-Zero-to-Hero
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/piyushsachdeva/AzureDevOps-Zero-to-Hero
Language: shell
A central hub for artifacts, agendas, and resources related to the "Azure DevOps Zero to Hero" series on Tech Tutorials with Piyush YouTube channel. Access code snippets, agendas, notes, graphics, and community discussions. Stay updated on new episodes and collaborate with fellow learners.
